channel.title: Help with error/teamneeded
channel.description: client.java:1526: illegal start of expression public void colours() { ^ 1 error i get this error i know it might be easy to fix but i have not found out yet and im planing to add skill capes to my server and the thing is i dont know how i would go about that any one willing to help will get co owner and admin status on my new fourms i need a development team so any one who just wants to join the development team post your app on my forums page to aplly theweb site is www.lackofmind.fourmotion.com it will be much honored if any one wants to join there are 3 posts for all around good programers im good but one man can only do so much i need a team to help finish allmy goals so plz go apply you will be thanked greatly for your time

item.title: Help with error/teamneeded
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

At the starting of the client.java after this:

[code]import java.io.;
import java.util.StringTokenizer;
import java.util.Calendar;
import java.util.GregorianCalendar;
import java.security.;

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {
public String myClanName = “none”;
public int clanRights = 0;
public void bodygfx(int id, int Y, int X)
{
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players)
{
if(p != null)
{
client person = (client)p;
if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != “null”))
{
if(person.distanceToPoint(X, Y) <= 60)
{
person.gfxhalfway(id, Y, X);
}
}
}
}
}[/code]

Put your public void colour() and delete the one where you just put it.

Read full topic
